04.04.2014 AS SCR#19044 Do not output (count) ATXT messages if there's no translation (ATXL record)

Build the whole JSON response structure ..

ExpSyntax.val: '"demo":' & IF ({0,11}, 'true', 'false') & ', "admno":' & Trim(Str({0,23},'')) & ', "clntno":' & Trim(Str({0,24},'')) & ', "usrid":"' & Trim({0,25}) & '", "name":"' & Trim({0,26}) & '", "email":"' & Trim({0,27}) & '", "defscreen":"' & Trim({0,54}) & '", "bu":"$bu", "gcl":"$gcl", "slang":"$slang", "nMsg":$nMsg, "popCheck": "$popCheck"'
